summary: Users need access to raw heartbeat details on Activity::Info, potentially as a collection of RawValue objects, to support use cases like providing hints. The feature also requires making heartbeat_details lazy to avoid eager deserialization for users working with raw values.
userImpact: Users working with raw heartbeat details for custom hint provisioning currently lack access to the underlying raw form, requiring eager deserialization.
proposedFix: Expose raw heartbeat details as a collection of Temporalio::Converters::RawValue on Temporalio::Activity::Info and implement lazy deserialization for heartbeat_details.
resolutionDetails: Feature implemented to expose raw heartbeat details and support lazy deserialization
keyQuote: Users may need access to the raw form of the last heartbeat details (e.g. if they want to provide hints)
